metadata.title: Project Office - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership

content_blocks.text: The Project Office's mission is to bring cutting-edge market partners into the academic model, guaranteeing students practical experience of project development in different industries and sectors of the economy.

Our team engages companies to learn about the Inteli model, publicizes the portfolio of projects available to the market and supports potential partners in mapping project initiatives. The most adherent and attractive initiatives are selected and will have prototype solutions built by the students. Agile Model Solution prototypes

The projects follow the agile methodology and are divided into five sprints of two weeks each over a 10-week period. During these sprints, seven meetings are scheduled with the project partner, as detailed below: Executive Onboarding: Start of the 1st Sprint
At this stage, an executive from the partner will give an institutional talk, covering topics about the company and sharing his professional career. Sprint meetings:

Kickoff: during the 1st weekSprint validations: 4 meetings scheduled every 15 days;final presentation: on the last day of the 5th Sprint;delivery of prototypes: within 30 days of completion of the module.

Have your challenge solvedby our students using technology Receivesolutionprototypesat the end of 10 weeks Bringing your brand closer tothe market's future technology leaders Increase your networkingwith our other partners
The experience of partners who have participated in our projects
